sentences.sContent: This alternative would have to operate as any other insurer, on the basis of the premiums it collects.
sentences.sContent_eng: This alternative would have to operate as any other insurer, on the basis of the premiums it collects.
sentences.sCn: 这个选项如同其他的保险公司一样，依靠它收取的保费生存。

sentences.sContent: At some moments in this crisis it has shown the way—by agreeing to supply dollars to countries that needed them, and by guaranteeing the contracts of European banks when it rescued a big insurer.
sentences.sContent_eng: At some moments in this crisis it has shown the way—by agreeing to supply dollars to countries that needed them, and by guaranteeing the contracts of European banks when it rescued a big insurer.
sentences.sCn: 在这次危机的某些时刻，美国显示出了这一做法，同意提供美元给需要的国家，而且当欧洲的银行在援救一个大保险公司的时候，担保它们的合约。

sentences.sContent: In between these visits, at the request of the hospital manager, I am constantly on the phone to my travel insurance party, as neither hospital nor insurer seems to accept what the other is saying.
sentences.sContent_eng: In between these visits, at the request of the hospital manager, I am constantly on the phone to my travel insurance party, as neither hospital nor insurer seems to accept what the other is saying.
sentences.sCn: 在那些探视者来访的间隙，按照医院经理的要求，我不断地和我的保险公司打电话，因为无论是医院还是保险公司似乎都不认同对方所说的情况。

words.tran: 保险；保险费；保险契约；赔偿金
确保；给…保险（insure的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a person or company that provides insurance
